message.base: **2014 (April/May)**: Moringa School was founded in Nairobi, Kenya, by Audrey Cheng (and Frank Tamre). The school began with its first cohort of 4-5 students, focusing on closing the tech skills gap in the region. Would you like to know what happened next?
message.formal: The genesis occurred in **2014 (April/May)**: Moringa School was established in Nairobi, Kenya, by Audrey Cheng (with Frank Tamre). The inaugural cohort comprised 4-5 students, with the initial mandate being to address the regional tech skills deficit. Shall I proceed to the next event?
message.casual: It all started in **2014 (April/May)**! Audrey Cheng (and Frank Tamre) founded Moringa School in Nairobi with just a tiny group of 4-5 students to tackle the tech skills shortage. Ready for the next big thing?
message.humorous: The origin story begins in **2014 (April/May)**, when Audrey Cheng (and Frank Tamre) launched Moringa School in Nairobi with just enough students to play a very small game of tag (4-5 of them). Want more historical nuggets?
